revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== Initialism of ''yet another stupid death''. ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|video games|[[roguelike]]s|slang}} The [[player]]'s [[accidental]] [[death]], caused by [[carelessness]], in a [[roguelike]] [[video game]]. ====References==== * Usenet newsgroups: [https://groups.google.com/forum/?q=%22yasds%22#!search/%22yasds%22] ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=adsy|dasy-|days|sayd|yads}}
